:ENV
export BOXES_TEST_XXD=1
:ARGS
-f 162_eol_control_list_designs_lf.cfg -l -e lf
:INPUT
:OUTPUT-FILTER
s/^.*([0-9a-fA-F]{4}):/0000\1:/
:EXPECTED

000000b0: 2066 6f6f 0a20 2020 2041 4141 0a0a 0a64   foo.    AAA...d
